snippet: The dance world’s version of the Academy Awards ceremony, the granting of the annual Bessie Awards, will be on Oct. 15 at the Apollo Theater.
abstract: Nominees are announced for the Bessie Awards, the dance world's version of the Academy Awards.
lead_paragraph: The dance world’s version of the Academy Awards ceremony, the granting of the annual Bessie Awards, will be on Oct. 15 at the Apollo Theater.

keywords.value: New York Dance and Performance Awards (Bessies)
